controllers

Class MainWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.MainWindowController

  • public class MainWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles user interaction with the GUI window. The GUI window shows information about flights, lets the user to find a flight by choosing destination from, destination to and the day of week. User can make a reservation of the chosen flight, save reservation, find reservation by its code, or airline, or client name, update reservation, making changes in the client name, citizenship or reservation status.
    Version:
    2019-06-27
    Author:
    Nick Hamnett, Viktoriia Davydova

    • Method Detail

      • onCreated

        public void onCreated()
        This method is called when the window is created.

      • loadFlight

        private void loadFlight()
        Method loads information about all the flights from the database file to the ListView when the GUI window is created

      • loadFlightFinderCombo

        private void loadFlightFinderCombo()
        Method creates Airport objects and loads them to the ComboBoxes. Information about Airports from, Airports to and Weekdays will be displayed in the ComboBoxes for user to select. Information about found flights will be displayed in the ListView

      • readFlightsViewList

        private void readFlightsViewList()
        Method retrieves information about flight and populates the TextFields with it

      • createReservation

        private void createReservation()
        Method creates the Reservation object and saves it in a binary file. NoMoreSeatsException, InvalidNameException and InvalidCitizenshipException exceptions will be handled

      • searchReservation

        private void searchReservation()
        Method to find the Reservation by code, or airline, or client's name and display the list of found Reservations in the ListView

      • readReservationViewList

        private void readReservationViewList()
        Method retrieves information about reservation and populates the TextFields with it

      • updateReservation

        private void updateReservation()
        Method to update the existing reservation in the binary file. Client's name, citizenship and status only can be changed. InvalidNameException and InvalidCitizenshipException exceptions will be handled

      • alert

        private void alert()
        Method to display the alert window when there are empty text fields left

      • onClosing

        public void onClosing()
        This method is called before the window is closed.
